name: You Are An Idiot
description:
[FOR BEST EXPERIENCE, USE FULLSCREEN IN WEB BROWSER] 

YouAreAnIdiot is a game inspired by an old virus by the same name. In this game, you control a virus which can shoot popup ads in cascades. Popup ammo can only be gotten back by certain powerups or by shooting enemies, making the resource finite. Collect mail for the recycling bin and get special power ups! This game is a submission for MiniJam 104. 

  • Music, Programming, and Art created by snerd.
  • Art heavily inspired by Windows 95.
  • I do not own any of the samples that were used in the music (and I am not making money off of any of the content that I do not own)

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys (MOVE)
  • Mouse (AIM)
  • Left Click (FIRE)
